mapper.select: select * from notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into notice(title, content, writer, file_path, file_save_name, file_ori_name) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{file_path}, #{file_save_name}, #{file_ori_name})
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where no=#{notice_no}
mapper.delete: delete from notice where notice_no=#{notice_no} and password=#{password}
mapper.select: select * from notice where ${searchName} like '%${searchValue}%' order by no DESC
